<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent"> <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <always_available>false</always_available> <category/> <fallback>false</fallback> <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session> <keyword>CheckStatus</keyword> <name>Check Status</name> <next_intent>5b25fe0edb5db200d1a9f1351d961930</next_intent> <order/> <output_speech_format/> <reprompt_speech_format/> <script><![CDATA[(function(content, attributes, erb){ erb.setOutputSpeech("PlainText", "Tell me the incident number you would like to check. result = erb.response;
})(content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder());]]></script> <slot_name_1/> <slot_name_2/> <slot_name_3/> <slot_type_1/> <slot_type_2/> <slot_type_3/> <sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-03-06 03:40:15</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8215be0edb5db200d1a9f1351d9619e7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jc</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 02:03:50</sys_updated_on> <top_level_intent>false</top_level_intent> </x_snc_amazon_echo_intent> </record_update>
